default.inclusion_criteria: Include peer-reviewed studies relevant to the active systematic review focus area.
default.exclusion_criteria: Exclude non-peer-reviewed material, editorial content, or records without an abstract.
default.backstory: a senior systematic reviewer coordinating evidence synthesis across interdisciplinary teams
default.additional_context: Score each record from 1 (exclude) to 5 (include). Highlight missing abstracts or unclear population details.
examples: Include: Clinical trials directly investigating the target intervention.
Exclude: Opinion pieces, editorials, or records without methodological detail.
